com.k2.XMLBuilder

Class XMLCData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLNode
      • com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLCData

  • public class XMLCData
extends XMLNode
    This class represents a CData node within an xml document CData sections contain data that is not xml encoded
    Author:
    simon
